ygData.subject: Re: Denied Access?
ygData.msgSnippet: NO!!!! its a broken spell... my friend bought it and now regrets it... there are a few others he warned me not to get... as soon as i talk to him next ill pass
ygData.messageBody:
NO!!!! its a broken spell... my friend bought it and now regrets it... there
are a few others he warned me not to get... as soon as i talk to him next
ill pass along the list

Nafertina lvl 7 dark elf [Tunare]


>From: "Wombat (Adam Abell)" <wombat11@...>
>
>Half elven scum! Like they would block a race from a mailing list... cmon
>people think! Any Necromancers that have a better description of what the
>spells, and which spells are a waste of money? Take vampiric embrace... is
>it worth the damn money at 8th level?
>
>Thanks,
>
>Wombat / Dark Elven Necromancer
